tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE Volunteers (
  volunteer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  volunteer_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  email VARCHAR(100) UNIQUE,
  phone_number VARCHAR(15),
  address VARCHAR(150),
  availability BOOLEAN
)

CREATE TABLE volunteers (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    organization_id INT,
    name VARCHAR,
    email VARCHAR,
    phone_number VARCHAR,
    join_date DATE,
    FOREIGN KEY (organization_id) REFERENCES organizations(id)
);

CREATE TABLE schedules (
  schedule_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  volunteer_id INT REFERENCES volunteers(volunteer_id),
  date DATE,
  shift_start TIME,
  shift_end TIME
);

CREATE TABLE projects (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(50),
    description TEXT,
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE schedules (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    project_id INT,
    volunteer_id INT,
    date DATE,
    start_time TIME,
    end_time TIME,
    FOREIGN KEY (project_id) REFERENCES projects(id),
    FOREIGN KEY (volunteer_id) REFERENCES volunteers(id)
);

CREATE TABLE tasks (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(50),
    description TEXT,
    project_id INT,
    required_volunteers INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (project_id) REFERENCES projects(id)
);

CREATE TABLE Schedules (
 id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 volunteer_id INT,
 date DATE,
 start_time TIME,
 end_time TIME
);
